医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
患者和伴侣报告的记忆力下降可能预示着早期阿尔茨海默病的变化一项新的研究进一步证明，当患者或家人注意到持续性记忆丧失的迹象时，与医生交谈很重要。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Memory-decline-reported-by-病人-and-partners-may-signal-early-Alzheimers-changes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Memory-decline-reported-by-病人-and-partners-may-signal-early-Alzheimers-changes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a8a00ca9-2f51-4f76-ad63-a0717fa923d9 Thu, 30 May 2024 13:19:14 -0400 Memory decline reported by patients and partners may signal early Alzheimer's changes
他汀类药物可能会阻断与癌症发展相关的炎症途径麻省总医院癌症中心（麻省总医院布里格姆医疗保健系统的创始成员之一）的研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，他汀类药物（常用的降胆固醇药物）可能会阻断与癌症发展相关的特定途径。慢性炎症。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Statins-may-block-an-inflammation-pathway-involved-in-the-development-of-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Statins-may-block-an-inflammation-pathway-involved-in-the-development-of-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b28f8430-424e-41da-9551-d17f30171911 Thu, 30 May 2024 08:36:00 -0400 Statins may block an inflammation pathway involved in the development of cancer
RCSI 和 Head Diagnostics 合作彻底改变多发性硬化症评估RCSI 与 Head Diagnostics（爱尔兰都柏林）合作开展一项临床研究，通过创新技术加强对多发性硬化症 (MS) 的评估和监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/RCSI-and-Head-Diagnostics-collaborate-to-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/RCSI-and-Head-Diagnostics-collaborate-to-revolutionize-multiple-sclerosis-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b857549-0b12-4daa-bd58-d5c6a504f04f Thu, 30 May 2024 08:23:46 -0400 RCSI and Head Diagnostics collaborate to revolutionize multiple sclerosis assessment
医疗补助“放松”期间，安全网健康诊所削减服务和员工蒙大拿州最大的为贫困人口提供服务的诊所之一已经削减了服务并解雇了工人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Safety-net-health-clinics-cut-services-and-staff-amid-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Safety-net-health-clinics-cut-services-and-staff-amid-Medicaid-e28098unwindinge28099.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f96f1fb-8988-4328-b6f6-8a74e21c9330 Thu, 30 May 2024 07:06:00 -0400 Safety-net health clinics cut services and staff amid Medicaid ‘unwinding’
一项不起眼的药品折扣计划抑制了乡村医院对联邦生命线的使用面对对乡村医院关闭的持续担忧，国会山立法者提出了一系列提案，以修复一项联邦计划，该计划旨在维持全国小城镇的救生服务。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/An-obscure-drug-discount-program-stifles-use-of-federal-lifeline-by-rural-hospitals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/An-obscure-drug-discount-program-stifles-use-of-federal-lifeline-by-rural-hospitals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59abed51-99fe-451f-b15b-db917c57bc80 Thu, 30 May 2024 07:04:13 -0400 An obscure drug discount program stifles use of federal lifeline by rural hospitals
推进治疗见解：利用 NanoBRET® 技术了解细胞靶标参与的影响在本次采访中，NewsMedical 与 Amy Landreman 讨论了 NanoBRET® 技术及其在细胞靶标参与中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Advancing-therapeutic-insights-The-impact-of-understanding-cellular-target-engagement-with-NanoBRETc2ae-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/Advancing-therapeutic-insights-The-impact-of-understanding-cellular-target-engagement-with-NanoBRETc2ae-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5198682-9aef-462c-813d-d110929ccc30 Thu, 30 May 2024 05:17:00 -0400 Advancing therapeutic insights: The impact of understanding cellular target engagement with NanoBRET® technology
hnRNPM 在蛋白质合成精度中的保护作用被发现贝勒医学院和合作机构的研究人员发现，一种名为 hnRNPM 的蛋白质有助于保护细胞制造蛋白质过程的完整性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/hnRNPMs-protective-role-in- Protein-synthesis- precision-uncovered.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240530/hnRNPMs-protective-role-in- Protein-synthesis- precision-uncovered.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=45d109bf-d9f8-414a-9b48-01fa5b2ef4ea Thu, 30 May 2024 04:04:42 -0400 hnRNPM's protective role in protein synthesis precision uncovered
创新型初创公司在替代蛋白质领域处于领先地位，以解决全球粮食危机《自然通讯》最近的一篇评论强调了创新型初创公司在推进替代蛋白质来源以应对全球粮食安全挑战并将这些努力转化为商业应用方面的关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Innovative-startups-leading-the-charge-in-alternative- Proteins-to-solve-global-food-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Innovative-startups-leading-the-charge-in-alternative- Proteins-to-solve-global-food-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3cb66e2e-c173-4326-b5ad-500fee6bfb32 Wed, 29 May 2024 23:59:00 -0400 Innovative startups leading the charge in alternative proteins to solve global food crisis
可食用机器人会成为食品和医药的未来吗？ 《自然评论材料》的一篇评论探讨了可食用材料在创造机器人食品和可食用机器人方面的潜力，强调了它们的治疗和环境效益，同时解决了当前的研究挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Could-edible-robots-be-the-future-of-food-and-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Could-edible-robots-be-the-future-of-food-and-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=55bb7ed0-7217-4eb8-b08e-3b40886cef6d Wed, 29 May 2024 23:23:00 -0400 Could edible robots be the future of food and medicine?
运动诱发的运动素：疾病预防和治疗的秘密武器《信号转导和靶向治疗》最近的一篇综述强调了运动诱导分子运动因子在疾病预防和治疗中的作用，强调了它们的分子机制和治疗潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Exercise-induced-exerkines-Secret-weapon-in-disease-prevention-and-therapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240529/Exercise-induced-exerkines-Secret-weapon-in-disease-prevention-and-therapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3b28144-59c5-40f9-a41f-88e64eede1be Wed, 29 May 2024 22:37:00 -0400 Exercise-induced exerkines: Secret weapon in disease prevention and therapy
